Subject: Activating 2FA for Administrators
Description: Is Google Authenticator the only 2FA app supported? What about Microsoft Authenticator or a third-party like DUO?
What_We_Know__c:
The 2FA mechanism implemented in EPP relies on the standard format for Time-Based One-Time Password (TOTP) systems.

The generated QR code is compatible with any mobile app that supports TOTP-based two-factor authentication.
Next_Steps__c: Waiting on customer to confirm we can close this ticket.
Solution_Comment__c: Customer was able to use an alternative authenticator besides Google for this.
